description: Welcome to Verge, a stunning end-unit townhouse built in 2023 with show-home quality finishes. This 3 bdrm home offers A/C & lower-floor office with built-in desk. The open-concept main floor features a gourmet kitchen with large island, gas stove, S/S appliances, built-in microwave & ample cabinetry & counter space. Built-in dining cabinetry with light-up wine display complements the living room with feature wall & electric F/P. Upstairs, the primary bdrm features a coffered ceiling, wall paneling, chandelier, electric fireplace & walk-in closet with full cabinetry + a luxurious 4 pc ensuite with double sinks & stand-up shower. 2 additional bdrms, 4 pc bath & large double garage with textured floor, cabinets & shelves complete the home. Ideally located in Langley, close to all amenities.
